1676420.name: Blood Labs
1676420.description: In this game you play as a scientist that has been working on a virus super weapon. The virus has escaped and infested all your co-workers, including you. All your co-workers have turned into horrible mutants but you have had a different effect. The virus has turned you into a super human. it is your job to fight through the rooms of your mutated co-workers in hope of escaping.
1676420.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
